title: Jfeat
author: Jfeat
content: Though am a beginner and I found this forum interested,and I believe that it's the best platform for me,and I still don't understand the modes of operations and ethics and kind of investment on this platform.Bitcoin over the years friends have told me the positive impact and implications,so my fellow members,pls put a brother true,if am too early to invest or notI relay on your advice and explanation to have great hope and the mind to continue and to also inform others about this,just as I was told by a friend.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: You are welcome to the Bitcoin world. As a newbie who hasn't gotten knowledge about Bitcoin have to learn and master the system before investing in it. Because there is risk therefore, you have to master the tools to invest. But if you have gotten the knowledge of Bitcoin even though as a newbie, you can invest in it. Investing in Bitcoin doesn't mean either you're a newbie or old Bitcoin but the experience is the key. Once again welcome on board.

comments.body: first and foremost make sure you familiarize yourself with the forums rules and regulations so as not to do anything that might jeopardize your account. check them out here.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1689727.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2766177.0This could be a starting point for you. Because you need knowledge of what you intend to invest in.  Don't just make investments because your have the purchasing power you should also learn how to access to risk involved and also how to DYOR ( Do Your Own Research). you should learn how to carryout a thorough research that'll also reduce the risk of scams. comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: I will give a short guide in order to make you understand the most safest and secure way to buy and hold Bitcoin.1. Get a hardware wallet e.g. Trezor.2. Use Tor network, never use Chrome.3. Only use Bisq to buy Bitcoin, don't use centralized exchange.4. Don't click any random links, never join a giveaway or airdrop and block everyone that contact you about crypto stuff.Congratulations, your Bitcoin would be safe 100%.

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: Undeniably, Bitcoin has become one of the most popular investment instruments today. Bitcoin investment can be done by anyone even those of you who are new to Bitcoin. You can start with small capital, you also need to need a more in-depth fundamental analysis of Bitcoin before getting into it.Bitcoin does offer great benefits, but there are risks involved. You need to develop the right strategy before starting to invest using Bitcoin, one of which is buying Bitcoin when the price is down. To do so sounds easy, but the process is not as simple as you think because it takes proper analysis to buy and sell Bitcoin to get the profit you want.

comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on November 07, 2022, 11:14:48 PMNewbie investing bitcoin without proper knowledge of the technology behind it is too risky.I would say not too important to understand the technical part for bitcoin if you are taking it for investment purposes because it's not easy task to be familiar with technical part or say working of bitcoin with network.For example there are lot of stuff like UTXO,Master key and children keys and other technical stuff which will not be easy to understand by everyone not having technical knowledge.But yes they should be having knowledge of how to make transactions,which wallet to use like non custodial wallets or hardware wallets or if they want to have bitcoin core download and save their funds in them safely with backup of seeds phrases in proper format which is essential.There are lot of scammers also trying to scam you of funds so always be safe from them by keeping update of the market.So they should understand that bitcoin is best investment tool to safeguard them against inflation as well and if they hold patiently over time they can surely gain profits out of it without any problem but as you say always DYOR but don't go for altcoins at all which may sound attractive to you but don't have any utility with them and turn you into racks.

comments.author: traderethereum
comments.body: You can invest in bitcoin whenever you want, but you need to remember that investing means you have to be able to control your emotions because the price of bitcoin is always changing and can make you panic.You can choose an exchange to start buying from and Binance is a great place to start but you have to complete verification there or use a non-centralized exchange like Bisq.Try not to panic if the price drops but see it as a way to buy more bitcoins.Buy bitcoins using the DCA method so you can buy bitcoins at low prices.
